## How to Test

1. Pull this branch.
2. Install dependencies.
3. Run `npm run test` to ensure all tests pass.
4. Run `npm run lint` to ensure code quality.
5. Run `npm run format` to ensure code formatting.
6. Run `npm run build` to ensure build process.
